replies.msg:
A golden opportunity to provide private client services to high net worth individuals. We believe our approach is paramount, and proven to be a necessity in each individual’s portfolio.

If you are seeking a role where you become a complete young entrepreneur, where growth and opportunities are unlimited, this platform will fulfil your aspirations.

Our vision is to develop people's talents and potentials throughout providing professional wealth management services to the clients.

Responsibilities:

Provide comprehensive financial and banking advice to clients
Constant monitoring of investment portfolios
Develop and expand existing network through relationship management

Requirements:

Fresh graduates will also be considered
Mature, self-motivated, hardworking and willing to learn
Energetic and outgoing
Good interpersonal and communication skills
Allow to work in Hong Kong is a must
